title: Create EV charging station time slot booking system

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for charging stations with properties: station ID, station name, location, number of charging ports, and operating hours
acceptanceCriteria: Charging station records can be created and retrieved
Each station has a unique identifier
Station includes location and port capacity information

requirements.text: Implement a time slot booking system where users can reserve charging slots in 30-minute increments
acceptanceCriteria: Time slots are bookable in 30-minute intervals
Each booking is associated with a specific station and port
Bookings include user identifier, station ID, port number, start time, and end time
Prevent double-booking of the same port at overlapping times

requirements.text: Create backend functions to check available time slots for a given station and date range
acceptanceCriteria: Users can query available slots for a specific station
System returns only unbooked time slots
Availability check considers station operating hours

requirements.text: Build a frontend interface to display a list of charging stations with their details and real-time availability
acceptanceCriteria: Charging stations are displayed in a list or grid view
Each station shows name, location, and number of available ports
Interface updates to reflect current availability

requirements.text: Implement a calendar or time picker interface for users to select their desired charging date and time slot
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select a date from a calendar view
Available time slots are displayed for the selected date
Unavailable slots are visually distinguished from available ones
Users can select a time slot to proceed with booking

requirements.text: Create a booking confirmation flow where users can review their selection and complete the reservation
acceptanceCriteria: Booking summary displays station name, date, time slot, and port number
Users can confirm or cancel the booking before submission
Successful bookings show a confirmation message
Failed bookings display appropriate error messages

requirements.text: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to manage bookings per user
acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in using Internet Identity
Bookings are associated with authenticated user principals
Users can only view and manage their own bookings

requirements.text: Create a user dashboard showing all current and upcoming bookings for the logged-in user
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays user's active bookings chronologically
Each booking shows station name, date, time, and port number
Users can view booking details

requirements.text: Add functionality for users to cancel their bookings at least 1 hour before the scheduled time
acceptanceCriteria: Users can cancel bookings from their dashboard
Cancellations are only allowed if more than 1 hour remains before start time
Cancelled slots become immediately available for other users
System displays appropriate messages for cancellation attempts within the 1-hour window

requirements.text: Design a modern, clean interface with a cohesive color scheme using green and electric blue accents to reflect the eco-friendly nature of electric vehicles, with clear typography and intuitive layouts for browsing stations and booking slots
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme consistently uses green and electric blue throughout the application
Typography is legible and hierarchy is clear
Layout facilitates easy navigation between station selection, time slot booking, and user dashboard
Design conveys an eco-friendly, modern aesthetic

constraints: All backend logic must be implemented in a single Motoko actor
Use Internet Identity for authentication only
Time slots must be in 30-minute increments
Bookings can only be cancelled at least 1 hour before scheduled time
nonGoals: Integration with physical charging station hardware
Multiple backend services or microservices architecture

required: Electric vehicle charging station illustration with modern design (ev-station.dim_800x600.png)
Green energy icon representing eco-friendly charging (eco-icon.dim_128x128.png)
